Translations.Text: ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu tubu ile-llahi tevbeten nesuha. `asa rabbukum ey yukeffira `ankum seyyiatikum veyudhilekum cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu yevme la yuhzi-llahu-nnebiyye vellezine amenu me`ah. nuruhum yes`a beyne eydihim vebieymanihim yekulune rabbena etmim lena nurana vagfir lena. inneke `ala kulli sey'in kadir
ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu cahidi-lkuffara velmunafikine vagluz `aleyhim. veme'vahum cehennem. vebi'se-lmesir
darabe-llahu meselel lillezine keferu-mraete nuhiv vemraete lut. kaneta tahte `abdeyni min `ibadina salihayni fehanetahuma felem yugniya `anhuma mine-llahi sey'ev vekile-dhule-nnara me`a-ddahilin
vedarabe-llahu meselel lillezine amenu-mraete fir`avn. iz kalet rabbi-bni li `indeke beyten fi-lcenneti veneccini min fir`avne ve`amelihi veneccini mine-lkavmi-zzalimin
vemeryeme-bnete `imrane-lleti ahsanet ferceha fenefahna fihi mir ruhina vesaddekat bikelimati rabbiha vekutubihi vekanet mine-lkanitin
